page.title: 02FACILITIES OF THE AREA.
page.content: West Kirby is a busy town which is the centre of the block as far as facilities are concerned.Caldy village has no shops,Newton has a very small shopping area,whilst West Kirby has a wide range of shops including two supermarkets.There is new shopping development in the form of an arcade which is due to be opened shortly. The station which is also going to be redeveloped to include further shops provides a direct link with Birkenhead and Liverpool,with trains running every 20 minutes.West Kirby is also a small bus terminus with frequent services to other parts of the Wirral. The Concourse which houses the Library also contains a medical and dental surgery and a day centre for the elderly as well as leisure facilities.
